sentence: Fear that the GOP might use secretary of state positions to more aggressively suppress votes — or to influence and potentially overturn future elections in ways secretaries like Benson, Raffensperger and Arizona’s Katie Hobbs (D) prevented in 2020 — has also driven a fundraising boom on the Democratic side.
author: Travis Waldron
title: GOP Election Deniers Are On Pace To Raise Record Sums For Secretary Of State Races

sentence: Doug Ducey refused to help him try to overturn his loss and election officials like Georgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger (a Republican) and Arizona Secretary of State Katie Hobbs (a Democrat) repeatedly discredited his baseless claims of fraud.
title: 'Clear line for election subversion': More than 80 Trump-truther candidates are running for key state offices

sentence: Doug Ducey refused to help him try to overturn his loss and election officials like Georgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger (a Republican) and Arizona Secretary of State Katie Hobbs (a Democrat) repeatedly discredited his baseless claims of fraud.
author: Igor Derysh
title: More than 80 Trump truthers are aiming for a power grab
